name: Manolo
description:
Collaboration between SupHernan and Gabriel. Our first Jam!

Our entry to the Brackeys Gamge Jam 2020.2, created in a week around the theme 'Rewind'. 

Manolo is an old man with alzheimer. With the help of golden clocks he can travel back in time and remember his past life. Move and jumpAWD or arrow keysRewindQSpecial abilitiesSpace

Fonts: Dafont free fonts

Background pictures: Wallpaper Abyys, Wallpaper Acces

SFX: Freesound

Programs and apps

Game Engine: Unity

Sprites Editor: Pixel Studio for pixel art

Tiles Editor: Gimp 2.0

Music: Bosca Ceoil
